displayProperties.name: Wild Hunt Cloak
displayProperties.description: Hide in shadow.

displayProperties.name: Silencing Shot
displayProperties.description: : Finish critically wounded combatants.

displayProperties.name: Phobos Warden Greaves
displayProperties.description: "We are deploying Guardians to all corners of the system." —Commander Zavala

4183003887.sourceString: Source: Complete strikes and earn rank-up packages from Commander Zavala.

displayProperties.name: Halcyon Corvette
displayProperties.description:
"Mars, Venus… this is all just the beginning. The stars are out there, kiddo, waiting for us."

—Unknown speaker, Golden Age audio recording

displayProperties.name: Atlas Hauler
displayProperties.description: We all carry heavy burdens. Don't carry yours alone.

displayProperties.name: Heavenly Lance
displayProperties.description: "That anger, the need for vengeance… it'll consume you if you let it." —Shaw Han

displayProperties.name: Stardevil Predator
displayProperties.description: "Don't fear the boogeyman. Be the boogeyman." —The Drifter

displayProperties.name: Cinder Pinion Boots
displayProperties.description: "They can't kill what they can't catch. Take flight." —Lord Shaxx

4229514328.sourceString: Source: Complete Crucible matches and earn rank-up packages from Lord Shaxx.

displayProperties.name: Forbidden Visage Vest
displayProperties.description: Equip this ornament on any eligible Legendary armor item to change its appearance. Once you get a universal ornament, it's unlocked for all characters of the relevant class on your account.

displayProperties.name: Shattered Sky
displayProperties.description: Equip this shader to change the color of your gear.

displayProperties.name: Bright Warning
displayProperties.description: Equip this shader to change the color of your gear.

displayProperties.name: Cinder Pinion Grasps
displayProperties.description: Ikora Rey still holds the record for most consecutive victories in the Crucible. No one else has come close.

4282723393.sourceString: Source: Complete Crucible matches and earn rank-up packages from Lord Shaxx.
